label: logicB:software_en
steps: [1] If a commit is pushed to main, then the CI pipeline runs.
[2] If the CI pipeline runs, then build artifacts are produced.
[3] For every service x, if unit tests for x pass, then x is eligible for deployment.
[4] If build artifacts are produced and service a is eligible for deployment, then service a is deployed to staging.
[5] A commit is pushed to main.
[6] Unit tests for service a pass.
[7] Build artifacts are produced and service a is eligible for deployment (from [1â€“3], [5], and [6]).
[8] Service a is deployed to staging (from [4] and [7]).
